summary: This is an FBI administrative document from the New York Field Office providing a response to an inquiry regarding a search of records through the Interstate Identification Index. It indicates that identification data was updated in 2016 and records can be obtained via NCIC transaction.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, which is the agency responding to the FBI inquiry.

events.title: Identification Data Update
events.description: The identification data for the record in question was updated in the system.

events.title: FBI Inquiry Response
events.description: The FBI New York Field Office received and responded to an additional inquiry regarding a search of records.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, Albany, New York
keyFacts: The document is an FBI administrative response to an inquiry about searching records through the Interstate Identification Index.
Identification data for the subject record was last updated on October 24, 2016.
Records can be obtained through the Interstate Identification Index using appropriate NCIC transactions.
The response comes from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, with Michael C. Green listed as Executive Deputy Commissioner.
